PR created from `feature/genui-workbench-refactor` into `main` will include:

- Collection management tools (`agent/tools/collection_manager.py`)
- Collections: `collections/*.collection.yml`
- Transpiled embeddings artifact: `experiments/micro-agents/models/dist/embeddings.js`
- Submodule: `external/awesome-Antigravity`
- .gitignore updates and hygiene changes

Please review CI and security alerts before merging.
